tool_description: Easily encrypt data with a cloud based service.
name: Encrypt
title: Encrypt

api_list.name: Encrypt Data
api_list.description:
Encrypt some data using one of the following cryptograph algorithms:
- RSA-MD4
- RSA-MD5
- RSA-MDC2
- RSA-RIPEMD160
- RSA-SHA1
- RSA-SHA1-2
- RSA-SHA224
- RSA-SHA256
- RSA-SHA3-224
- RSA-SHA3-256
- RSA-SHA3-384
- RSA-SHA3-512
- RSA-SHA384
- RSA-SHA512
- RSA-SHA512/224
- RSA-SHA512/256
- RSA-SM3
- blake2b512
- blake2s256
- id-rsassa-pkcs1-v1_5-with-sha3-224
- id-rsassa-pkcs1-v1_5-with-sha3-256
- id-rsassa-pkcs1-v1_5-with-sha3-384
- id-rsassa-pkcs1-v1_5-with-sha3-512
- md4
- md4WithRSAEncryption
- md5
- md5-sha1
- md5WithRSAEncryption
- mdc2
- mdc2WithRSA
- ripemd
- ripemd160
- ripemd160WithRSA
- rmd160
- sha1
- sha1WithRSAEncryption
- sha224
- sha224WithRSAEncryption
- sha256
- sha256WithRSAEncryption
- sha3-224
- sha3-256
- sha3-384
- sha3-512
- sha384
- sha384WithRSAEncryption
- sha512
- sha512-224
- sha512-224WithRSAEncryption
- sha512-256
- sha512-256WithRSAEncryption
- sha512WithRSAEncryption
- shake128
- shake256
- sm3
- sm3WithRSAEncryption
- ssl3-md5
- ssl3-sha1
- whirlpool
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://encrypt.p.rapidapi.com/encrypt"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "encrypt.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Encrypt Data with a Key
api_list.description:
Encrypt some data using one of the following cryptograph algorithms and a key through HMAC:
- RSA-MD4
- RSA-MD5
- RSA-MDC2
- RSA-RIPEMD160
- RSA-SHA1
- RSA-SHA1-2
- RSA-SHA224
- RSA-SHA256

- id-rsassa-pkcs1-v1_5-with-sha3-512

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://encrypt.p.rapidapi.com/encryptWithKey"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "encrypt.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://encrypt.p.rapidapi.com/encryptWithKey"
